snippet.title: Battleloot Adventure prologue
snippet.description:
Following frequent complaints from the Hairy Mountain Trolls' and Orcs' unions, Digital Tales was forbidden to show any more graphic violence against monsters... so enjoy Battleloot Adventure's story prologue!

Helm on and roll out... your adventure is about to begin!
